title: Engineering Saccharomyces cerevisiae and controlling conditions for 2,3-butanediol production from glycerol
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE00912F, Paper
Sadat Mohamed Rezk Khattab, Mohamed Ali Abdel-Rahman, Masato Katahira, Takashi Watanabe
2,3-Butanediol (2,3-BDO) has gained much attention due to its bulk chemical uses in numerous applications such as the production of pharmaceuticals, cosmetics, synthetic rubber, inks, resins, perfumes, foodstuffs, fuel additives, and aviation fuel.
